Andy's Blog

Day 1

10 June 2014

My first day was mostly spent setting up my machine, which consisted of installing the different technologies I’ll be using over the course of the summer–Ruby, Rails, etc–and getting reacquainted with OSX. I also got to learn more about Viget and started constructing this blog, which required getting myself familiar with Jekyll. In addition to Jekyll, I also used Bootstrap for the nav bar and basic layout help.

comments powered by Disqus

About Me

Hi everyone! I'm (almost) a graduate of the University of North Carolina where I studied computer science and astrophysics. This summer, I'll be working at Viget's Durham office as a Rails Dev Intern. On this blog, I'll be keeping track of the projects that I work on, the different technologies and resources that I'm learning and anything that I generally find interesting and relevant.
